headline.print_headline: Cigarettes Are Enlisted To Test Ways Of Quitting
headline.seo: Cigarettes Are Being Used in Studies to Help Smokers Quit
headline.main: Cigarettes Are Enlisted to Test Ways of Quitting

docs.abstract: Scientists are studying the effects of lower-nicotine test cigarettes on smokers in an attempt to get them to quit; smoking rate in United States has stayed at about 20 percent since 2004 after years of notable decline.
docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists have been studying the effects of lower-nicotine test cigarettes on smokers in an attempt to get them to quit.
docs.snippet: Scientists have been studying the effects of lower-nicotine test cigarettes on smokers in an attempt to get them to quit.
